name: Kamik Iceland Waterproof Insulated Boots - Men's
description: When stepping out into Winter’s worst, you need boots that are up to the task. With rugged construction of waterproof leather sitting atop a flexible rubber base, the Iceland boots will keep the elements right where they should be.Waterproof design with PU coated leather and fully sealed seams.Soft microfleece lining is warm and wicking.Padded collar and tongue seal out cold air.200 grams of Thinsulate™ synthetic insulation is light and efficient.EVA insoles have Cleansport NXTTM non-toxic odour treatment.Flexible synthetic rubber shell stands up to harsh conditions.Defender 2 outsole has deep aggressive lugs that offer improved stability and traction, and clear mud and snow with ease.Includes a second set of laces.Kamik rates these boots down to -40°C.
